ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | keephyp.1 | |- ( A = if ( ph , A , B ) -> ( ps <-> th ) ) |
| 2 |  | keephyp.2 | |- ( B = if ( ph , A , B ) -> ( ch <-> th ) ) |
| 3 |  | keephyp.3 | |- ps |
| 4 |  | keephyp.4 | |- ch |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_ifboth | |- ( ( ps /\ ch ) -> th ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_mp2an | |- th |
